(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP We))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (ADVP (RB just))
      (VP (VBN completed)
        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (NN revamp))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (DT the) (JJ ieat) (NN hawker) (NN database))))
        (SBAR (RB so) (RB now)
          (S
            (NP (PRP it))
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (ADJP (RB updated) (JJ live)))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(completed-4, We-1)
aux(completed-4, have-2)
advmod(completed-4, just-3)
root(ROOT-0, completed-4)
det(revamp-6, a-5)
dobj(completed-4, revamp-6)
prep(revamp-6, of-7)
det(database-11, the-8)
amod(database-11, ieat-9)
nn(database-11, hawker-10)
pobj(of-7, database-11)
advmod(live-17, so-12)
advmod(live-17, now-13)
nsubj(live-17, it-14)
cop(live-17, is-15)
advmod(live-17, updated-16)
dep(completed-4, live-17)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT That))
    (VP (VBZ means)
      (S
        (NP (PRP you))
        (VP (VB get)
          (NP
            (NP (VBN updated))
            (SBAR
              (WHADVP (WRB whenever))
              (S
                (NP (JJ new) (NNS stalls))
                (VP (VBP are)
                  (VP (VBN added)))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(means-2, That-1)
root(ROOT-0, means-2)
nsubj(get-4, you-3)
ccomp(means-2, get-4)
dobj(get-4, updated-5)
advmod(added-10, whenever-6)
amod(stalls-8, new-7)
nsubjpass(added-10, stalls-8)
auxpass(added-10, are-9)
rcmod(updated-5, added-10)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (JJ ieat) (NN hawker) (NN app))
    (VP (VBZ gives)
      (NP (PRP you))
      (NP
        (NP (NN access))
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP
            (NP
              (QP (IN over) (CD 600)))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP
                (NP (NNP Singapore) (POS 's))
                (JJS best) (NN hawker) (NNS stalls)))))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT which))
          (S
            (NP (PRP I))
            (VP (VBP have)
              (VP (VBN blogged)
                (PP (IN over)
                  (NP (DT the) (JJ last) (CD 6) (NNS years)))))))))
    (. .)))


det(app-4, The-1)
amod(app-4, ieat-2)
nn(app-4, hawker-3)
nsubj(gives-5, app-4)
root(ROOT-0, gives-5)
iobj(gives-5, you-6)
dobj(gives-5, access-7)
prep(access-7, to-8)
quantmod(600-10, over-9)
pobj(to-8, 600-10)
prep(600-10, of-11)
poss(stalls-16, Singapore-12)
possessive(Singapore-12, 's-13)
amod(stalls-16, best-14)
nn(stalls-16, hawker-15)
pobj(of-11, stalls-16)
dobj(blogged-20, which-17)
nsubj(blogged-20, I-18)
aux(blogged-20, have-19)
rcmod(access-7, blogged-20)
prep(blogged-20, over-21)
det(years-25, the-22)
amod(years-25, last-23)
num(years-25, 6-24)
pobj(over-21, years-25)

  (S
    (NP (PRP It))

    (PP (IN opening)
      (NP (NNS times)))
    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP
      (NP (NNS addresses))
      (CC and)
      (NP (NN contact) (NNS numbers)))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP We))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (VP (VBN made)
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (ADJP (JJ simple)
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB use)
                  (SBAR (RB so) (IN that)
                    (S
                      (NP (PRP you))
                      (VP (MD can)
                        (VP (VB find)
                          (NP
                            (NP (DT the) (NN info))
                            (SBAR
                              (S
                                (NP (PRP you))
                                (VP (VBP want)
                                  (PP (IN within)
                                    (NP (DT a) (JJ few) (NNS seconds))))))))))))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(made-3, We-1)
aux(made-3, have-2)
root(ROOT-0, made-3)
nsubj(simple-5, it-4)
xcomp(made-3, simple-5)
aux(use-7, to-6)
xcomp(simple-5, use-7)
advmod(find-12, so-8)
mark(find-12, that-9)
nsubj(find-12, you-10)
aux(find-12, can-11)
advcl(use-7, find-12)
det(info-14, the-13)
dobj(find-12, info-14)
nsubj(want-16, you-15)
rcmod(info-14, want-16)
prep(want-16, within-17)
det(seconds-20, a-18)
amod(seconds-20, few-19)
pobj(within-17, seconds-20)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN As)
      (NP
        (NP (NN part))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (DT the) (NNP Chinese) (NNP New) (NNP Year) (NNP Celebrations)))))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, As-1)
pobj(As-1, part-2)
prep(part-2, of-3)
det(Celebrations-8, the-4)
nn(Celebrations-8, Chinese-5)
nn(Celebrations-8, New-6)
nn(Celebrations-8, Year-7)
pobj(of-3, Celebrations-8)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NN ieat) (NN hawker) (NNP Full) (NNP Version))
    (VP (MD will)
      (VP (VB be)
        (ADJP (JJ FREE)
          (PP (IN from)
            (NP (NN today))))
        (PP (IN till)
          (NP (CD 17) (NNP Feb) (NNS 2012)))))
    (. .)))


nn(Version-4, ieat-1)
nn(Version-4, hawker-2)
nn(Version-4, Full-3)
nsubj(FREE-7, Version-4)
aux(FREE-7, will-5)
cop(FREE-7, be-6)
root(ROOT-0, FREE-7)
prep(FREE-7, from-8)
pobj(from-8, today-9)
prep(FREE-7, till-10)
num(2012-13, 17-11)
nn(2012-13, Feb-12)
pobj(till-10, 2012-13)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB Click)
      (ADVP (RB here))
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB download)
            (S
              (NP (PRP it))
              (VP (VB FREE)
                (PP (IN for)
                  (NP (JJ Chinese) (NNP New) (NN Year)))))))))
    (. !)))

ccomp(download-4, FREE-6)
prep(FREE-6, for-7)

nn(Year-10, New-9)
pobj(for-7, Year-10)


(ROOT
  (FRAG (CC Or)
    (VP
      (VP (VB search)
        (PP (IN for)
          (NP
            (NP (JJ ieat) (NN hawker))
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP (NNP AppStore))))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VB look)
        (PP (IN for)
          (NP (DT the) (JJ ieat) (NNP hawker) (NNP App) (NNP Happy) (NNP New) (NN Year) (NN everyone)))))
    (. !)))


cc(search-2, Or-1)
root(ROOT-0, search-2)
prep(search-2, for-3)
amod(hawker-5, ieat-4)
pobj(for-3, hawker-5)
prep(hawker-5, in-6)
pobj(in-6, AppStore-7)
cc(search-2, and-8)
conj(search-2, look-9)
prep(look-9, for-10)
det(everyone-18, the-11)
amod(everyone-18, ieat-12)
nn(everyone-18, hawker-13)
nn(everyone-18, App-14)
nn(everyone-18, Happy-15)
nn(everyone-18, New-16)
nn(everyone-18, Year-17)

(ROOT
  (SQ (VBP Do)
    (NP (NN help))
    (VP
      (VP (VB spread)
        (NP (DT the) (NN news)))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VB tell)
        (NP (PDT all) (PRP$ your) (NNS friends))
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB download)
              (NP (PRP it)))))))
    (. !)))


aux(spread-3, Do-1)
nsubj(spread-3, help-2)
root(ROOT-0, spread-3)
det(news-5, the-4)
dobj(spread-3, news-5)
cc(spread-3, and-6)
conj(spread-3, tell-7)
predet(friends-10, all-8)
poss(friends-10, your-9)
dobj(tell-7, friends-10)
aux(download-12, to-11)
xcomp(tell-7, download-12)
dobj(download-12, it-13)


(ROOT
  (VP (VB Huat)
    (INTJ (UH Ah) (. !))))

    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (ADJP (JJ due)
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP
            (NP (PRP$ my) (NN mistake) (NNS people))
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WP who))
              (S
                (VP (VBP have)
                  (VP (VBN downloaded)
                    (NP (PRP it))
                    (PP (IN on)
                      (NP (CD 12))))))))))
      (NNP Feb))
    (VP (VBD were)
      (VP (VBN charged)))
    (. .)))


amod(Feb-12, due-1)
prep(due-1, to-2)
poss(people-5, my-3)
nn(people-5, mistake-4)
pobj(to-2, people-5)
nsubj(downloaded-8, who-6)
aux(downloaded-8, have-7)
rcmod(people-5, downloaded-8)
dobj(downloaded-8, it-9)
prep(downloaded-8, on-10)
pobj(on-10, 12-11)
nsubjpass(charged-14, Feb-12)
auxpass(charged-14, were-13)
root(ROOT-0, charged-14)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (VP (VBN extended)
        (NP (DT the) (JJ free) (NN download))
        (PP (IN till)
          (NP
            (NP (CD 17) (NNP Feb) (CD 2012))
            (PP (IN from)
              (ADVP (RB previously)))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(extended-3, I-1)
aux(extended-3, have-2)
root(ROOT-0, extended-3)
det(download-6, the-4)
amod(download-6, free-5)
dobj(extended-3, download-6)
prep(extended-3, till-7)
num(Feb-9, 17-8)
pobj(till-7, Feb-9)
num(Feb-9, 2012-10)
prep(Feb-9, from-11)
pcomp(from-11, previously-12)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (NNP Sorry))
    (PP (IN about)
      (NP (DT that)))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, Sorry-1)
prep(Sorry-1, about-2)
pobj(about-2, that-3)
